price: She said to his sister, “Keep track of him.” So she watched him from a distance, without them noticing.
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
